episodes.title: In the Shadow of the Truth
episodes.plot: When DCI Roz Huntley captures a serial killer, Forensic Coordinator Tim Ifield alerts AC-12 to a possible miscarriage of justice.

episodes.title: Who Sows the Wind
episodes.plot: A dismembered body is discovered, and worries grow when Roz fails to report for duty. After further questioning of Michael Farmer unearths crucial new information, AC-12 challenge the case against him.

episodes.title: In the Trap
episodes.plot: As shocking new evidence is unearthed, AC-12 step up their investigation into the case against Michael Farmer.

episodes.title: Moral Superiority
episodes.plot: The discovery of new forensic anomalies appears to provide AC-12 with a major breakthrough. Meanwhile, Nick Huntley comes under scrutiny.

episodes.title: Lying Nest
episodes.plot: AC-12's future hangs in the balance after Hilton bars them from investigating Roz Huntley. But Roz's problems are building closer to home.

episodes.title: Royal Hunting Ground
episodes.plot: AC-12 pit their wits against Roz Huntley in a climactic duel to find Tim Ifield's murderer and unmask Balaclava Man.
